mapper.insert: insert into TRANSACTION_REVIEW (tx_no, tx_review_type, review_no) values ( #{txReviewNo}, #{txReviewType}, #{reviewNo} )
mapper.select:
select t.tx_buyer_no, r.review from TRANSACTION_REVIEW x left outer join REVIEW r on x.review_no=r.review_no left outer join TRANSACTION t on x.tx_no=t.tx_no
where x.tx_no=#{txReviewNo} and x.tx_review_type='구매자 리뷰' and x.review_no=#{reviewNo} and rownum<=6

select p.pdt_seller_no, r.review from TRANSACTION_REVIEW x left outer join REVIEW r on x.review_no=r.review_no left outer join TRANSACTION t on x.tx_no=t.tx_no left outer join PRODUCT p on t.tx_pdt_no=p.pdt_no where x.tx_no=#{txReviewNo} and x.tx_review_type='판매자 리뷰' and x.review_no=#{reviewNo} and rownum<=6
